News.Title: Paramount Sues Warner Bros Discovery Over Disclosure
News.Summary: Paramount files lawsuit against Warner Bros Discovery seeking information disclosure to shareholders and plans to nominate directors to oppose Netflix merger deal.

News.Title: Paramount Dye Tec: Weak Listing Leads to 5% Lower Circuit
News.Summary: Paramount Dye Tec Ltd. shares listed at a 6.4% discount on NSE SME platform Emerge, opening at Rs 109.90 against the IPO price of Rs 117. The stock further declined to hit a 5% lower circuit at Rs 104.40. The IPO was oversubscribed 50.16 times, with strong demand from non-institutional investors.
